news.title: Adrian Dunbar says people "jumped to conclusions" about KNEECAP
news.summary: The Line Of Duty star recently attended a KNEECAP show with his daughter, of which he said, "We had a great time."

news.title: Ozzy Osbourne's cause of death revealed
news.summary: The Black Sabbath Frontman's death certificate was submitted by his daughter Aimee, in London

news.title: Wolf Alice drop new single ‘White Horses’
news.summary: Check out the music video for the new release below

news.title: Leitrim venue cancels "far-right" festival following letter signed by KNEECAP, Fontaines D.C., Christy Moore
news.summary: The open letter said the festival would "tarnish the proud history of the Mayflower as a venue."

news.title: Weapons director Zach Cregger: "Weapons is a really weird movie that goes to places I don’t think anybody would be able to predict”
news.summary: Having enjoyed a breakout hit with 2022’s cult smash Barbarian, director Zach Cregger has now returned with hotly anticipated mystery-horror Weapons, which focuses on a group of kids who suddenly disappear overnight.

news.title: Oasis in '00: "I have got caught up in some nonsense that I shouldn’t have. But I was young"
news.summary: Ahead of Oasis’s sold-out Croke Park shows on August 16 & 17, we’re taking a deep-dive into the Hot Press archives – to hear Liam and Noel's incredible story in their own words...
